articles.description: Kylian Mbappe flatters to deceive as a youthful Barcelona side showed plenty of strength in adversity in coming back to beat Paris St-Germain in their Champions League quarter-final first leg.
articles.title: Raphinha upstages Mbappe as Barca kids break records

articles.description: Ronda Rousey - judoka, mixed martial artist, wrestler - tells BBC Sport how she has found inner peace after coming back from the lowest point of her career.
articles.title: Ronda Rousey: How former UFC fighter found solace and inner peace

articles.description: The start of the 2024 Masters on Thursday is set to be disrupted with thunderstorms forecast to hit Augusta National.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Storms set to disrupt opening round at Augusta National

articles.description: Five-time winners Barcelona come from behind to earn a slender advantage over Paris St-Germain in the first leg of their Champions League quarter-final in France.
articles.title: Christensen gives Barcelona slender lead over PSG

articles.description: Atletico Madrid hold off a late Borussia Dortmund fightback to hold the advantage after the first leg of their Champions League quarter-final.
articles.title: Atletico hold on to edge Dortmund in first leg

articles.description: Britain's Tyson Fury says Oleksandr Usyk is too small to compete with him in their undisputed heavyweight world title fight in May.
articles.title: Tyson Fury says Oleksandr Usyk is too small to beat elite heavyweights

articles.description: On their day, Atalanta can beat anyone. They just haven't had one of those days in a while, writes BBC Sport columnist Mina Rzouki.
articles.title: Atalanta are 'ferocious' but can they match Liverpool?

articles.description: Masters organisers rule out modifying Augusta's iconic 12th hole as golf's rulers aim to combat players hitting the ball further.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Augusta organisers rule out extending iconic 12th hole

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Rodri says he is planning to take a break during the season run-in as the club chase a second successive Treble.
articles.title: I need a rest - Man City midfielder Rodri

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp says injured trio Trent Alexander-Arnold, Allison and Diogo Jota are back in training.
articles.title: Injured Liverpool trio train before Atalanta tie
